extendedInfo.description: The simplest in the world notepad. Nothing extra, no ads, loads instantly. Follow us http://vk.com/fastnotepad

reviews.title: Cool nd easy
reviews.comment: Loved it so easy to use  Also same file can be open in pc also
reviews.author: ganesh shetty

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: very cool application . loads really fast and easy to use and lovelly app.
reviews.author: Karan (BIR)

reviews.title: Awesome little app! Just open it and go!
reviews.comment: So simple and easy to use. It\'s a super effective tool because it opens very quickly and you\'re ready to write down your idea, phone number, shopping item or whatever.
reviews.author: David Parry

reviews.title: Four stars
reviews.comment: Love it, so far. I really like the \"select all\" option. But as many free apps, more options would be nice. Different colors or font styles would be cool
reviews.author: Ashlyn Peel

reviews.title: Efficient
reviews.comment: Simple, fast and doesn\'t need a lot of permissions. Saved to your sd card, but not to cloud so consider that. I like it for simple  fast notes.
reviews.author: Francesca S

reviews.title: Real Fast
reviews.comment: I really LOVE this app..! Really, really fast to open. Really, really fast to use. It\'s simple but useful. Can make and save any important notes with only one klick! ;)
reviews.author: Diah Ayuditha

reviews.title: Simply The Best.
reviews.comment: To be on the safe side It\'s best to install this app on the sd card.  Should you have to do a factory reset your notes will be saved on the sd card.  Excellent app please don\'t ruin it by making silly updates like other app developers do.
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: Fast and basic, works great!
reviews.comment: I was looking for something basic for simple notes just on my phone, works offline. (I use Evernote for bigger, synced notes.) There\'s so much out there for notepad apps, this jewel was hard to find. But it is just what I was looking for. Fast, simple straightforward, saves notes as .txt files in the folder you choose (with subfolders you create). Thanks for a great app!
reviews.author: Dale Talsma

reviews.title: Awesome...
reviews.comment: Seriously Awesome, but the title bar is very big. Hope the developer reduces the title bar and also allows the app to open in full-screen mode there by giving more screen realestate.  But Still a 5-star app.  :)
reviews.author: RAVI TEJA

reviews.title: Five Star Product.
reviews.comment: Name folders, name notes any size. Never have repeat writing same thing again. With ingenuity can be backed- up to PC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Data input lags
reviews.comment: As Brandon has pointed out, before the update data input was pretty fast but now I\'ve noticed it lags severely. For users who type fast this is annoying. The new interface is great but you\'ll need to fix up the bug with the lag time.
reviews.author: Stephen Morgan

reviews.title: Works great, a good app
reviews.comment: Simple and easy to use. Works as advertised and easy to use. One issue... it keeps my phone turned on, so you manually have to power off if in use, but that\'s not really a bug. I recommend it.
reviews.author: Tom Mones

reviews.title: Lovee this appp excellent
reviews.comment: Easy, simple, and user friendly, also i like the fact that this app saves the document as a .txt file which allows you to see them on the computer.
reviews.author: Mohammed Hussain Seedat

reviews.title: Notepad
reviews.comment: Simple, fast and easy to use. I wish more apps would follow these guide lines.
reviews.author: Thomas Ault

reviews.title: Black Theme - text area is white when landscape
reviews.comment: In Black theme, the text area is white in landscape mode. Is it possible to make it black? Excellent app otherwise.  Thank you :)
reviews.author: Ilya Parshakov

reviews.title: Note deleted
reviews.comment: Seemed great at first, simple and easy but app crashed after updating a note - the note included a page of entries made over several days, completely lost, the whole thing cleared and all my information lost.  Not happy and uninstalling app, looking for something else that has backup and restore.
reviews.author: Cate C

reviews.comment: Incredibly helpful! notes also work on PC so there\'s no worry when transferring to your computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Auto Replace function is annoying
reviews.comment: It was very difficult to write due to auto replace function, sorry i cannot use it.
reviews.author: Hasan Farooq

reviews.title: Does what it says
reviews.comment: I like the option to have a black background, to encrypt notes, to change the default home folder. It is simple, FAST. No waiting for google drive, evernote or dropbox to load for ages. I can take notes fast and it is in plain universal text files.   Thank you for this invaluable tools. Something similar should come by default with my phone...
reviews.author: Tiberiu Nicolae

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Its a great app but I Will point out three things that needs to be sorted out ASAP:  1. Needs a search option that will search for \"individual words\" in the .txt file.  2. I\'m using a HTC one X I don\'t know if it\'s just my phone but sometimes without me doing it the cursor will jus jump right back to the beginning/end. It needs 2 stay at d exact position where I left it unless specified.  3.it needs a password lock. Not everyone can bother with the trouble 2 go in another app example \"applocker\" 2 lock apps
reviews.author: Adrian Duckett
